title: Online Microlearning for Improving Metadata Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Knowledge of Information Management and Basic Understanding of Library Science
context.additional_context: Mobile-friendly short-term training for working professionals, emphasizing connections to mathematical data structures

learning_goals: Learners will be able to identify 5 core metadata elements (topic, relationship, format, etc.) with 90% accuracy.
Learners will be able to achieve at least 80% metadata consistency by applying controlled vocabulary standards.
Learners will be able to self-assess metadata completeness (accuracy/completeness) through a 3-step verification process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
